title: ASUS M5A99FX PRO R2.0 AM3+ AMD 990FX SATA 6Gb/s USB 3.0 ATX AMD Motherboard
description: The ASUS M5A99FX PRO R2.0 motherboard features the AMD 990FX/SB950 Chipset, compatible with the AMD Socket AM3 for AMD Phenom II/Athlon II/Sempron 100 Series Processors. ASUS is pleased to announce that the M5A99FX PRO R2.0, the AMD 9 Series Model featuring the Latest Dual Intelligent Processors 3 (DIP3) Support, provides the user with the all New DIGI+ Power Control, which allows for a Complete Digital Power Solution. ASUS’ DIGI+ Power Control features the CPU & DRAM digital power design, SMART DIGI+ Key OC tuning profile, Real-Time VRM Adjustment, Five Modes of Load Line Calibration, Current Capability Control, Precise tuning under BIOS and UI, and a friendly UI to allow for easy and precise control. In addition, the M5A99FX PRO R2.0 features ASUS’ exclusive Remote GO!, which provides the user with a simple solution to enjoy seamless Wireless Entertainment. With Remote GO!, the user can enjoy unmatched Multi-media Management, Diverse Remote Control, and Easy File Sharing. The M5A99FX PRO R2.0 is the Total BIOS Solution, and is the FIRST AMD-based Motherboard with the USB BIOS Flashback feature, originally only featured on ASUS’ award-winning Republic of Gamers product line. Along with DirectKey and UEFI BIOS, the M5A99FX PRO R2.0 makes BIOS Setup and Updates a breeze. Network iControl is all you need to perfectly manage the bandwidth, providing a ON/OFF Instant Bandwidth Boost, Customized Profiles, Priority Scheduling, and Auto PPPoE Connection. With DTS Ultra PC II, all the different digital audio formats will be monitored and balanced to achieve the perfect balance in overall Volume Level, and along with DTS Connect, which provides an Audio Restoration function, the ASUS M5A99FX PRO R2.0 provides the user with the Perfect Audio Experience.
